attributes.action: Create a Syrian Family Scheme visa for people homeless due to the earthquake
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government to help and support Syrian people in Syria and Turkey, officially the Republic of Turkey, who are homeless and have family in the UK to come to the UK, like the Ukraine Family Scheme visa.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to help and support Syrian people in Syria and Turkey, officially the Republic of Turkey, who are homeless and have family in the UK to come to the UK, like the Ukraine Family Scheme visa.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632816
